Class InvalidTheoryException

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidTheoryException
extends PrologException
    This exceptions means that a not valid tuProlog theory has been specified
    See Also:
    Theory, Serialized Form
